message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you consider that?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $160?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering it to you for $165. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $155?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm going to have to think carefully about how much more I can give, but I'm willing to meet you at $162. This is my final concession, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $155 and $162, which would be $158.50. Can you consider that?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, and I think we've already been discussing that price. I'm not willing to split the difference again, so I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $162. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
